initial_observations: Strong revenue growth of 78% in 2024, driven by Space Systems division

Large contracted backlog of $1.067B provides revenue visibility
Successful transition from launch-focused to integrated space systems company
High gross margins in Space Systems (33.4%) indicate strong business model
